summary: Replaces current 512*512 vanilla textures with brand new, handcrafted high quality textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Horse HQ Retex WIP - by Halendia

[color=red][size=10]AWGERFGQWUJE FINALS IN SCHOOL, ERROR ERROR HALENDIA DOES NOT COMPUTE[/size][/color]

Category: Textures > Horses > Replacement Textures

Other Mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30823]Iridum Eyes[/url][/center]
If anyone is interested in helping with variation, troubleshooting etc. as of now, please do! I\'m currently very busy with my job (in the stables, ironically), and school and my own horses.

Textures are made from my own photographs, thanks to Bailey and Santa for... standing still :)

Shout at me very loudly if there\'s anything else!!

Troubleshooting, Adding and Editing to be done:

Minor seams and remains from vanilla textures (cheap way to temporarily get rid of pesky seams)

[center][u]Recommended[/u] mods (that is not REQUIRED mods):[/center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15449]Horse Body Mesh by Holugar[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13348]Horse Armors for Skyrim by Mystikhybrid[/url]
author: Halendia
